features: Animated steam particles rising from cup
Snowy landscape background with falling snow
Canvas-based particle system for steam and snow
notes: Canvas visualization with two particle systems (steam + snow)
Three buttons styled as noir terminal commands: [BREW] [POUR] [DRINK]
State machine: empty → brewing → filled → drinking → empty (loops)
Steam intensity increases during brew, decreases when drinking
Snow falls continuously in background for atmosphere
Coffee cup drawn as simple terminal ASCII-style graphic
Add subtle sound effects consideration (optional mute toggle)
Particle physics: steam rises with slight horizontal drift, snow falls with wind
Button states: disabled when action unavailable (brew when full, pour when empty)
Visual feedback: cup fills with brown gradient, empties on drink
Reset to empty state after drink animation completes

userPrompt: create an interactive visualization of a coffee cup producing steam in a snowy landscape with a button to brew, to pour, and to drink
